channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- Rider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- Rider

item.title: CVE-2022-29821|2024-08-03T06:33:42.841Z -- jetbrains -- rider
item.description: In JetBrains Rider before 2022.1 local code execution via links in ReSharper Quick Documentation was possible

item.title: CVE-2024-24939|2024-06-04T17:43:14.404Z -- jetbrains -- rider
item.description: In JetBrains Rider before 2023.3.3 logging of environment variables containing secret values was possible
